sentences.en: "What are you thinking?" he asked curiously.
sentences.cn: “你在想什么？” 他好奇地问道。

sentences.en: After the second of third offence I was warned that I should be beaten next time, but I received the warning in a curiously roundabout way.
sentences.cn: 这样子一两次之后，我被警告，如果再有第三次我会挨揍的。 我以一种好奇的迂回曲则的方式接受了这个警告。

sentences.en: Carmen Elcira introduced herself to him that night, fumbling with her English, and he, smiling curiously at her, invited her to come out with the band to get a drink.
sentences.cn: 那晚，卡门·艾尔茜拉用磕磕巴巴的英语向他做了自我介绍，而他呢，好奇地冲着她微笑，邀请她和乐队一起去喝酒。

sentences.en: Curiously enough he had never seen the little girl.
sentences.cn: 说也奇怪,他竟从未见过那个小女孩.

sentences.en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentences.en: Harry was curiously silent through all this.
sentences.cn: 在整个过程中哈里都一言不发，令人费解。

sentences.en: He complained of feeling curiously weak and faint.
sentences.cn: 他抱怨说感到莫名地虚弱和头晕.

sentences.en: He felt curiously detached from what was going on.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很奇怪,对于正在发生的事情感到超然物外.

sentences.en: He looked curiously at the people.
He's curiously innocent about what this means to other people.
sentences.cn: 关于这对其他人意味着什么，他一无所知，这一点颇不寻常。

sentences.en: His boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: Liz picked up the blue envelope and turned it over curiously.
sentences.cn: 莉兹拿起蓝色信封，好奇地翻过来看。
她感到莫名其妙地满足.
她看上去好像心烦意乱，真奇怪。

sentences.en: She regarded him curiously for a moment.
sentences.cn: 她好奇地看了他一会儿。
她单纯得令人难以置信。

sentences.en: The boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨.

sentences.en: This beautiful and curiously shaped lake lies at around fifteen thousand feet.
sentences.cn: 这个形状奇特的美丽湖泊周长约有15,000英尺。

words.tran_cn: 好奇的，有求知欲的；古怪的；爱挑剔的
好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩

trans.tran_cn: 好奇地，奇异地，奇怪地，说来古怪
